alert.note: Alert for Chariton; Howard; Linn; Macon; Randolph; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:39PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Randolph, Chariton, southeastern Linn, northern Howard, northeastern Saline and Macon Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 338 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Glasgow, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moberly, Macon, Brookfield, Marceline, Salisbury, Huntsville, Glasgow, Bevier, Higbee, Keytesville, Bucklin, Clark, Callao, Cairo, Armstrong, New Cambria, Renick, Jacksonville, Clifton Hill and Rothville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Chariton; Howard; Linn; Macon; Randolph; Saline
